languages.text: После смерти преподобного Иеронимуса Скорбного роль предводителя друзианцев принял человек по прозвищу Капеллан. Имя свое он скрывал, но не таил ни грехов, ни пиратского прошлого. С решимостью опытного пустотохода он управлял культом и даже водил единоверцев в военные походы против разбойников, насаждая порядок и обращая в веру плененных нечестивцев.

After the death of Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, a man called Chaplain took over the leadership of the Drusian mission. He hid his name, but not his crimes or his piratical past. With the resolve of an experienced voidfarer, he steered the cult and even led his fellow believers on military expeditions against brigands, enforcing order and converting depraved captives to the faith.
languages.original_text: После смерти преподобного Иеронимуса Скорбного роль предводителя друзианцев принял человек по прозвищу Капеллан. Имя свое он скрывал, но не таил ни грехов, ни пиратского прошлого. С решимостью опытного пустотохода он управлял культом и даже водил единоверцев в военные походы против разбойников, насаждая порядок и обращая в веру плененных нечестивцев.

traits.locale_text: After the death of Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, a man named Chaplain took over the leadership of the Drusian mission. He hid his name but did not hide his sins or his past of a pirate. With the resolve of an experienced voidfarer, he steered the cult and even led his fellow believers in military expeditions against reavers, enforcing order and converting sinful captives to faith.

With the resolve of an experienced voidfarer, he steered the cult and even led his fellow believers in military expeditions against reavers, enforcing order and converting sinful captives to faith.

languages.text: 希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索死后，一个被称为“牧师”的人接管了德鲁苏斯教会的领导权。他隐姓埋名，但并没有隐瞒他的罪行和曾经的海盗经历。这位虚空旅者凭借丰富的经验和决心，领导着德鲁苏斯教会，甚至带领他的信徒们进行军事远征，打击海盗，维护秩序，让堕落的俘虏皈依于信仰的旗下。
languages.original_text: After the death of Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, a man called Chaplain took over the leadership of the Drusian mission. He hid his name, but not his crimes or his piratical past. With the resolve of an experienced voidfarer, he steered the cult and even led his fellow believers on military expeditions against brigands, enforcing order and converting depraved captives to the faith.

traits.locale_text: 希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索死后，一个被称为“牧师”的人接管了德鲁苏斯教会的领导权。他隐姓埋名，但并没有隐瞒他的罪行和曾经的海盗经历。这位虚空旅者凭借丰富的经验和决心，领导着德鲁苏斯教会，甚至带领他的信徒们进行军事远征，打击海盗，维护秩序，让有罪的俘虏皈依于信仰的旗下。

languages.text: Nach dem Tod von Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso übernahm ein Mann, den alle nur Ordenspriester nannten, die Führung der Drusianer-Mission. Er verbarg seinen Namen, nicht aber seine Verbrechen oder seine Vergangenheit als Pirat. Mit der Entschlossenheit eines erfahrenen Raumfahrers steuerte er den Kult und führte seine Gläubigen sogar auf militärische Expeditionen gegen Räuber, um die Ordnung durchzusetzen und verkommene Gefangene zum Glauben zu konvertieren.
languages.original_text: After the death of Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, a man called Chaplain took over the leadership of the Drusian mission. He hid his name, but not his crimes or his piratical past. With the resolve of an experienced voidfarer, he steered the cult and even led his fellow believers on military expeditions against brigands, enforcing order and converting depraved captives to the faith.

traits.locale_text: Nach dem Tod von Hieronymus Doloroso übernahm ein Mann, den alle nur Ordenspriester nannten, die Führung der Drusianer-Mission. Er verbarg seinen Namen, nicht aber seine Fehltritte oder seine Vergangenheit als Pirat. Mit der Entschlossenheit eines erfahrenen Raumfahrers steuerte er den Kult und führt seine Gläubigen sogar auf militärische Expeditionen gegen Räuber, um die Ordnung durchzusetzen und sündige Gefangene zum Glauben zu konvertieren.

languages.text: Après la mort du révérend Hiéronymus Doloroso, un homme se faisant appeler Chapelain prit les rênes de la mission drusienne. Il taisait son véritable nom, sans chercher à cacher ses crimes ou sa vie passée de pirate. Avec la détermination d'un voyageur stellaire aguerri, il guida le culte et mena même les autres croyants dans diverses expéditions militaires contre les brigands pour imposer l'ordre et convertir à sa foi les prisonniers dépravés.
languages.original_text: After the death of Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, a man called Chaplain took over the leadership of the Drusian mission. He hid his name, but not his crimes or his piratical past. With the resolve of an experienced voidfarer, he steered the cult and even led his fellow believers on military expeditions against brigands, enforcing order and converting depraved captives to the faith.

traits.locale_text: Après la mort de Hiéronymus Doloroso, un homme se faisant appeler Chapelain prit les rênes de la mission drusienne. Il taisait son véritable nom, mais pas ses transgressions ni sa vie passée de pirate. Avec la détermination d'un voyageur stellaire aguerri, il guida le culte et mena même les autres croyants dans diverses expéditions militaires contre les brigands pour imposer l'ordre et convertir les prisonniers à sa foi.

languages.text: Después de la muerte del reverendo Hieronymus Doloroso, un hombre llamado Capellán se hizo con el liderazgo de la misión drusiana. Ocultaba su nombre, pero no sus crímenes ni su pasado como pirata. Con la determinación de un Navegante del vacío veterano, marcó el rumbo del culto e incluso dirigió a los demás creyentes en expediciones militares contra los maleantes, defendiendo el orden y convirtiendo a sus prisioneros impíos a la fe.
languages.original_text: After the death of Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, a man called Chaplain took over the leadership of the Drusian mission. He hid his name, but not his crimes or his piratical past. With the resolve of an experienced voidfarer, he steered the cult and even led his fellow believers on military expeditions against brigands, enforcing order and converting depraved captives to the faith.

traits.locale_text: Después de la muerte de Hieronymus Doloroso, un hombre llamado Capellán se hizo con el liderazgo de la misión drusiana. Ocultaba su nombre, pero no sus crímenes ni su pasado como pirata. Con la determinación de un navegante del vacío veterano, marcó el rumbo del culto e incluso dirigió a los demás creyentes en expediciones militares contra los maleantes, defendiendo el orden y convirtiendo a sus prisioneros impíos a la fe.

languages.text: ヒエロニムス・ドロローソ司祭の死後、教戒官と呼ばれる男が代わってドルシアン聖務団を統率した。男は名を明かさなかったが、自らの犯罪や海賊としての過去を隠そうとはしなかった。彼は歴戦の虚空渡りとしての堅い意思で教団の舵取りを進めつつ、信者たちを凶賊討伐に向かわせ、命令を下しては堕落した捕虜たちを改宗させるという働きを見せた。
languages.original_text: After the death of Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, a man called Chaplain took over the leadership of the Drusian mission. He hid his name, but not his crimes or his piratical past. With the resolve of an experienced voidfarer, he steered the cult and even led his fellow believers on military expeditions against brigands, enforcing order and converting depraved captives to the faith.

traits.locale_text: ヒエロニムス・ドロローソ司祭の死後、教戒官と呼ばれる男が代わってドルシアン聖務団を統率した。男は名を明かさなかったが、自らの犯罪や海賊としての過去を隠そうとはしなかった。彼は歴戦の虚空渡りとしての堅い意思で教団の舵取りを進めつつ、信者たちを凶賊討伐に向かわせ、命令を下しては堕落した捕虜たちを改宗させるという働きを見せた。

languages.text: Muhterem Hieronymus Doloroso'nun ölümünün ardından Drusus Misyonu'nun liderliğine Papaz olarak bilinen bir adam geçti. İsmini gizleyen bu şahıs, suçlarını ve geçmişteki korsanlık faaliyetlerini gizleme gereği görmüyordu. Tecrübeli bir gemicinin de desteğiyle tarikata yön verdi, hatta takipçilerini haydutlara karşı asker olarak kullanıp düzeni sağladı ve ahlaksız tutsakların imana gelmesine önayak oldu.
languages.original_text: After the death of Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, a man called Chaplain took over the leadership of the Drusian mission. He hid his name, but not his crimes or his piratical past. With the resolve of an experienced voidfarer, he steered the cult and even led his fellow believers on military expeditions against brigands, enforcing order and converting depraved captives to the faith.

traits.locale_text: Muhterem Hieronymus Doloroso'nun ölümünün ardından Drusus Misyonu'nun liderliğine Papaz adını kullanan bir adam geçti. İsmini gizlemiş olabilir ancak suçlarını ve geçmişte yaptığı korsanlıkları gizlemedi. Tecrübeli bir gemicinin de desteğiyle tarikata yön verdi ve hatta takipçilerini haydutlara karşı askerî amaçlarla kullanıp düzeni sağladı, ahlaksız tutsakların imana gelmesine önayak oldu.
